mapper.select: SELECT eci.id, eci.title, eci.lesson_num AS lessonNum, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo, et.NAME AS teacherName, ecd.description, eci.cover, eci.price FROM edu_course_info eci LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON eci.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON eci.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON eci.subject_parent_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON eci.subject_id = es2.id WHERE eci.id = #{courseId}
